page.title: 20LOCAL GOVERNMENT AND CREDITS
page.content:
THE M.P.FOR THIS AREA IS MR.ROBERT HICKS.THE DESCENDING STRATA OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT ARE CORNWALL COUNTY COUNCIL, CARADON DISTRICT COUNCIL(LISKEARD),ST.GERMAN'S PARISH COUNCIL AND SHEVIOCK PARISH COUNCIL.
THIS PART OF THE SURVEY WAS RESEARCHED BY SIX MEMBERS OF THE DOWNDERRY AND SEATON W.I., ASSISTED BY MEMBERS OF HESSENFORD AND ST.GERMANS W.I. BRANCHES,MEMBERS OF DOWNDERRY AND SEATON RESIDENT'S ASSOCIATION AND THE CHAIRMAN OF ST.GERMANS PARISH COUNCIL.ALSO THE NEWLY-FORMED CARADON FIELD AND NATURAL HISTORY CLUB SUPPLIED INFORMATION FROM THEIR FIRST {1984}REPORT.
ADDITIONAL MATERIAL WAS OBTAINED FROM THE "WESTERN MORNING NEWS".
